General.Name: Qua Granite Hayal Yapi ve Urunleri Sanayi Ticaret AS
General.Description: QUA Granite Hayal Yapi ve Ürünleri Sanayi Ticaret A.S. manufactures, exports, and sells ceramics, floor tiles, tile materials, and granite in Turkey, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company also offers bathroom, kitchen, outdoor, and wall tiles; and toilets, luminaires, sinks, reservoirs, and shower systems. It sells its products through dealers, distributors, and DIY market chains. QUA Granite Hayal Yapi ve Ürünleri Sanayi Ticaret A.S. was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Aydin, Turkey.
General.Address: Söke Organize Sanayi Bölgesi Mah., Aydin, Turkey, 09260
